00009 #ifndef BOOST_TT_IS_INTEGRAL_HPP_INCLUDED
00010 #define BOOST_TT_IS_INTEGRAL_HPP_INCLUDED
00011 
00012 #include "boost/config.hpp"
00013 
00014 // should be the last #include
00015 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/bool_trait_def.hpp"
00016 
00017 namespace boost {
00018 
00019 //* is a type T an [cv-qualified-] integral type described in the standard (3.9.1p3)
00020 // as an extention we include long long, as this is likely to be added to the
00021 // standard at a later date
00022 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_DEF1(is_integral,T,false)
00023 
00024 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_CV_SPEC1(is_integral,unsigned char,true)
00025 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_CV_SPEC1(is_integral,unsigned short,true)
00026 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_CV_SPEC1(is_integral,unsigned int,true)
00027 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_CV_SPEC1(is_integral,unsigned long,true)
00028 
00029 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_CV_SPEC1(is_integral,signed char,true)
00030 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_CV_SPEC1(is_integral,signed short,true)
00031 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_CV_SPEC1(is_integral,signed int,true)
00032 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_CV_SPEC1(is_integral,signed long,true)
00033 
00034 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_CV_SPEC1(is_integral,bool,true)
00035 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_CV_SPEC1(is_integral,char,true)
00036 
00037 #ifndef BOOST_NO_INTRINSIC_WCHAR_T
00038 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_CV_SPEC1(is_integral,wchar_t,true)
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 #if (defined(BOOST_MSVC) && (BOOST_MSVC == 1200)) \
00042     || (defined(BOOST_INTEL_CXX_VERSION) && defined(_MSC_VER) && (BOOST_INTEL_CXX_VERSION <= 600)) \
00043     || (defined(__BORLANDC__) && (__BORLANDC__ == 0x600) && (_MSC_VER == 1200))
00044 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_CV_SPEC1(is_integral,unsigned __int8,true)
00045 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_CV_SPEC1(is_integral,__int8,true)
00046 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_CV_SPEC1(is_integral,unsigned __int16,true)
00047 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_CV_SPEC1(is_integral,__int16,true)
00048 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_CV_SPEC1(is_integral,unsigned __int32,true)
00049 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_CV_SPEC1(is_integral,__int32,true)
00050 #ifdef __BORLANDC__
00051 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_CV_SPEC1(is_integral,unsigned __int64,true)
00052 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_CV_SPEC1(is_integral,__int64,true)
00053 #endif
00054 #endif
00055 
00056 # if defined(BOOST_HAS_LONG_LONG)
00057 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_CV_SPEC1(is_integral,unsigned long long,true)
00058 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_CV_SPEC1(is_integral,long long,true)
00059 #elif defined(BOOST_HAS_MS_INT64)
00060 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_CV_SPEC1(is_integral,unsigned __int64,true)
00061 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_CV_SPEC1(is_integral,__int64,true)
00062 #endif
00063 
00064 } // namespace boost

00066 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/bool_trait_undef.hpp"

00068 #endif // BOOST_TT_IS_INTEGRAL_HPP_INCLUDED
